// item-detail.component.ts import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { itemService } from './items.service'; import { IItem } from './item'; import { AuthService } from '../shared/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-item-detail', templateUrl: './item-details.component.html' }) export class ItemDetailComponent implements OnInit { item: any; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private itemService: itemService, private authService: AuthService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.route.params.subscribe((params) => { const itemId = params['id']; this.itemService.getItemById(itemId).subscribe((item) => { this.item = item; }); }); } canUpdateItem(item: IItem): boolean { if (this.authService.isAuthenticated() && this.authService.isAdmin()) { return true; } else { alert('You need to be an admin to delete items.'); return false; } } }
